p: At least in humans, introduction of a healthy diet, regular sleep, and exercise can go a long way toward synchronizing many biorhythms and stabilize drug targets. Interestingly, such modifications of lifestyle have clear effects on chromatin modifications which reflect the extent of biological aging. 86 This finding provides further evidence for the possibility to modify with drugs, diet, or exercise the epigenetic processes that are associated with age‚Äêinduced deterioration or adverse mutation.
